0.Pros: Meals, customers, fast paced environment, work around schedule, and time offs

1.Pros: At McDonalds you work with people from all over the globe, sharing culture and language. Coworkers are usually quite nice.
1.Cons: Customers, however, can be difficult. And the pay/time off is atrocious.

2.Pros: Nice coworkers, can fool around in the backroom

3.Cons: Working with yahoos is always a challenge.

4.Pros: College tuition help every year, flexible
4.Cons: pay could be better and bonuses

6.Pros: when someone came in early, you could go home. Would have random drawings for prizes, college benefits only if you have worked there for more than nine months, and occasionally snacks in the employees room.

7.Pros: free meals and discounts, decent pay
